name: Kem
about_me: Friends would describe me as intelligent, driven, witty and affectionate. I am an ambitious person and enjoy meeting new people and finding ways to help them have an uplifting experience.

name: Ben
about_me: Travelling is also a major passion of mine, and I spend a lot of my free-time planning out future adventures. I would love to travel through South America sometime, especially Argentina. Something about the culture just speaks to me... not to mention, they make fantastic wine.

name: Ann
about_me: I`m new the city and looking to meet some nice people. If you like any of this things, we will get along great.

name: Sara
about_me: I`m an outgoing lady who loves nightlife, weekend adventures, dancing, karaoke and meeting new people!

name: Alexandr
about_me: I`m a nice person, who likes getting out to the nature and hiking. On my Sundays I'm going to the gym and like to do yoga or exercise.

name: Bella
about_me: Hello Everyone! I can describe myself as an active person, who is interesting in social live, like to go the museums, theaters and  listen live music. Message me, if you are looking for a company!

name: Cameron
about_me: I`m a kind and easygoing person. I like traveling and  recently back from my trip in Europe. Looking for someone who also like to get new experience, getting know other people and cultures.

name: Kerry
about_me: Let me know if you are also enjoy trying a new dinner place or visiting a local bars.

I have an 18 month old german shepherd named Ringo - he unfortunately lost one of his legs in a car accident, but he's still the cutest thing on the planet! I love animals and hope to meet someone who shares this passion.

Please Note: If you can't go 5 minutes without checking Facebook on your phone, we're probably not a good match. However, if you enjoy having thought-provoking conversation and aren't afraid of the occasional spirited debate, give me a shout!

On a typical Friday night I am probably attending yoga class, or biking down one of the many gorgeous trails in our city. I'm the type of person who will do things on a whim, and I'm looking for a partner with the same mentality.

I make an effort to eat raw foods as much as possible, but I've been known to indulge in a Big Mac on occasion. (I must admit, there's no better cure for a hangover than two all-beef patties, special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions on a sesame seed bun!)
Anyway, if you're a laid-back intellectual who can appreciate a freshly made quinoa salad and the occasional chai latte, send me a message.

My biggest passion in life is music. I LOVE Bon Jovi, Journey and Van Halen (and pretty much every other hair band from the 80's!). There's nothing quite as exhilarating as strumming on a six-string with my friends as we sing classic rock songs at the top of our lungs.
